Ignite the Forge.name: Ignite the Forge
Ignite the Forge.fullText:
Gatekeeper of the Golden Palace Attack 11Ignite the Forge

Divine flames course ahead of your attack and leap to your friends’ weapons and implements, wreathing them in shining flame.

Encounter        Divine, Fire, Radiant ; Implement or Weapon
Standard Action      Personal

Effect: You use an at-will attack power. If you hit, the damage is fire and radiant damage. Each ally adjacent to you gains a +5 power bonus to damage rolls until the end of your next turn and the damage they deal is fire and radiant damage.


Published in Dragon Magazine 387, page(s) 62.
Ignite the Forge.flavor: Divine flames course ahead of your attack and leap to your friends’ weapons and implements, wreathing them in shining flame.
keywords: Divine, Fire, Radiant ; Implement or Weapon
Ignite the Forge.effect: You use an at-will attack power. If you hit, the damage is fire and radiant damage. Each ally adjacent to you gains a +5 power bonus to damage rolls until the end of your next turn and the damage they deal is fire and radiant damage.

Citizen's Arrest.name: Citizen's Arrest
Citizen's Arrest.fullText:
Gatekeeper of the Golden Palace Attack 20Citizen's Arrest

You are wreathed in crackling bolts of Erathis’s might, empowering your normal spells or attacks. As you spend the power, it leaves a spark in each of your allies.

Daily        Divine, Radiant ; Implement or Weapon
Standard Action      Personal

Effect: You use an at-will attack power. Choose one target of the attack. If you hit that target, it is stunned (save ends). If you miss that target, it is dazed (save ends). If you hit or miss that target, until the end of the encounter when an ally adjacent to you hits the target, that ally can push the target 2 squares or slow the target until the end of its next turn.


Published in Dragon Magazine 387, page(s) 62.
Citizen's Arrest.flavor: You are wreathed in crackling bolts of Erathis’s might, empowering your normal spells or attacks. As you spend the power, it leaves a spark in each of your allies.
Citizen's Arrest.effect: You use an at-will attack power. Choose one target of the attack. If you hit that target, it is stunned (save ends). If you miss that target, it is dazed (save ends). If you hit or miss that target, until the end of the encounter when an ally adjacent to you hits the target, that ally can push the target 2 squares or slow the target until the end of its next turn.

Hestavar's Blessing.name: Hestavar's Blessing
Hestavar's Blessing.fullText:
Gatekeeper of the Golden Palace Utility 12Hestavar's Blessing

You sway an ally’s fortune with a simple blessing from the Bright City.

Encounter        Divine
Minor Action      Melee 1

Target: One ally

Effect: The target can make a saving throw or spend a healing surge. In addition, the target can shift 3 squares to a square adjacent to at least one of his or her allies as a free action.


Published in Dragon Magazine 387, page(s) 62.
Hestavar's Blessing.flavor: You sway an ally’s fortune with a simple blessing from the Bright City.
Hestavar's Blessing.effect: The target can make a saving throw or spend a healing surge. In addition, the target can shift 3 squares to a square adjacent to at least one of his or her allies as a free action.
